20110127230650.000|20110127230651.000|CC1|LEVERAGE, VERY LITTLE CAPITAL

20110127230658.000|20110127230700.000|CC1|THERE WERE FAILURES IN THE

20110127230714.000|20110127230716.000|CC1|>> I WANT TO GO TO THIS BACKDOOR

20110127230733.000|20110127230735.000|CC1|PAYING GOLDMAN 100 CENTS ON THE 
20110127230735.000|20110127230736.000|CC1|DOLLAR WHEN AT THAT POINT THE   
20110127230736.000|20110127230738.000|CC1|MOST THEY WOULD HAVE GOTTEN WAS

20110127230747.000|20110127230748.000|CC1|LOOKS?                          
20110127230748.000|20110127230751.000|CC1|>> WELL, THERE'S NO QUESTION

20110127230754.000|20110127230759.000|CC1|OWED MONEY RECEIVED 100% ON THE 
20110127230759.000|20110127230759.000|CC1|DOLLAR.                         
20110127230759.000|20110127230800.000|CC1|BUT THAT JUDGMENT WAS MADE BY   
20110127230800.000|20110127230801.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE IN THE TRENCHES AT   
20110127230801.000|20110127230801.000|CC1|THE TIME.                       
20110127230801.000|20110127230804.000|CC1|AND REALLY IT'S NOT OUR FUNCTION
20110127230804.000|20110127230807.000|CC1|AS A COMMISSION TO SECOND GUESS 
20110127230807.000|20110127230809.000|CC1|THOSE JUDGMENTS.                
20110127230809.000|20110127230811.000|CC1|AIG ENTERED INTO CREDIT DEFAULT 
20110127230811.000|20110127230814.000|CC1|SWAP CONTRACTS UNDER WHICH THEY 
20110127230814.000|20110127230817.000|CC1|AGREED TO INSURE THE            
20110127230817.000|20110127230819.000|CC1|COUNTERPARTIES AGAINST THE      
20110127230819.000|20110127230821.000|CC1|FAILURE OF THOSE PARTICULAR     
20110127230821.000|20110127230823.000|CC1|SECURITIES, AND TO THAT EXTENT, 
20110127230823.000|20110127230825.000|CC1|AIG OWES THEM THE MONEY.        
20110127230825.000|20110127230828.000|CC1|NOW, IF AIG HAD GONE OUT OF     
20110127230828.000|20110127230830.000|CC1|BUSINESS, HAD IT NOT BEEN BAILED
20110127230830.000|20110127230832.000|CC1|OUT BY THE GOVERNMENT, OF       
20110127230832.000|20110127230833.000|CC1|COURSE, THEY WOULDN'T HAD BEEN  
20110127230833.000|20110127230835.000|CC1|ABLE TO PAY THE MONEY AND THE   
20110127230835.000|20110127230836.000|CC1|COUNTERPARTIES WOULD HAVE BEEN  
20110127230836.000|20110127230837.000|CC1|LEFT HOLDING THE BAG WITH       
20110127230837.000|20110127230840.000|CC1|INSURANCE THAT COULDN'T PAY.    
20110127230840.000|20110127230843.000|CC1|SO NOW THE QUESTION IS, NOW THAT
20110127230843.000|20110127230846.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT HAS INFUSED SOME 
20110127230846.000|20110127230848.000|CC1|$180 BILLION INTO AIG AND SOME
